verbs.description: [ARG0: US President Donald Trump] [V: described] [ARG1: some migrants] [ARG2: as " animals "] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] , [ARGM-LOC: in a charged discussion about the border wall and law enforcement] .
US President Donald Trump described some migrants as " animals " Wednesday , in a [V: charged] [ARG1: discussion] about the border wall and law enforcement .
